tool_description: Access all of the Urban Dictionary, the one-stop shop for slang definitions.

api_list.name: Define a Word / Search
api_list.description: Can be used to define a specific word or search for word definitions.

required_parameters.name: term
required_parameters.description: The word you want to define.

api_list.name: Random Word
api_list.description: Returns a list of random words and definitions from the Urban Dictionary database.

api_list.name: Word of the Day
api_list.description: Gets the Word of the Day for the past 10 days, including today.
